title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1403/94 of 20 June 1994 fixing for the 1994 marketing year the reference prices for table grapes
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1403/94 of 20 June 1994 fixing for the 1994 marketing year the reference prices for table grapes
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1994 marketing year, the reference prices for table grapes, falling within CN codes 0806 10 15 and 0806 10 19, expressed in ecus per 100 kilograms net of packed products of class I, of all sizes, shall be as follows:
21 July to 31 August: 51,92,
September and October: 49,20,
November (1 to 20): 44,87.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 21 July 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
